p: RSPs were purified from the supernatant of a WNV-HeLa3 cell line that secretes them constitutively ( Merino-Ramos et al., 2014) by centrifugation through a sucrose gradient as described ( Martin-Acebes et al., 2014). Immunodot analyses were performed to select peak fractions containing WNV-specific E protein ( Merino-Ramos et al., 2014), the amount of which was estimated by Bradford assay using a standard curve of bovine serum albumin.
